name: Peace Lily
description: Indoor plant with white blooms. Prefers shade and moist soil.

care_instructions.watering: Once a week or when soil feels dry
care_instructions.fertilizer: Once a month with balanced houseplant fertilizer

name: Snake Plant
description: Hardy succulent known for upright sword-like leaves.

care_instructions.fertilizer: Once every 2 months during growing season

name: Aloe Vera
description: Succulent with medicinal gel, requires well-drained soil.

care_instructions.fertilizer: Once in spring with diluted cactus fertilizer

common_issues: leaf browning due to overwatering or cold

name: Spider Plant
description: Fast-growing plant with arching green and white striped leaves.

care_instructions.watering: Weekly or when top inch of soil is dry
care_instructions.fertilizer: Twice a month during growing season

common_issues: leaf tips browning due to fluoride in water

name: Boston Fern
description: Classic fern with feathery fronds. Loves humidity.
common_issues: frond yellowing due to dry air or underwatering

name: Money Plant (Pothos)
description: Trailing vine with heart-shaped leaves. Very low maintenance.

care_instructions.watering: Once a week or when soil dries out

name: Areca Palm
description: Graceful palm with feathery fronds, good for living rooms.

care_instructions.watering: Keep soil evenly moist, water when top inch is dry

common_issues: leaf tips browning from dry air

name: Jade Plant
description: Fleshy-leafed succulent that symbolizes good luck.

care_instructions.fertilizer: Once in spring with succulent feed

common_issues: leaf drop due to cold or low light

name: Rubber Plant
description: Glossy large leaves; adds a bold statement indoors.

care_instructions.watering: When top 1-2 inches of soil are dry

common_issues: droopy leaves from underwatering or cold

name: Lavender
description: Fragrant herb with purple flowers, best grown outdoors.

care_instructions.watering: When soil is dry; avoid overwatering
care_instructions.fertilizer: Once in spring with low-nitrogen fertilizer

common_issues: root rot in poorly drained soil
